quests.name: Guardian of the Twilight
quests.description: Become the 'Guardian of the Twilight' by completing the ancient ritual in the 'Twilight Grove.' Harness the power of day and night to defend the sacred grove from impending darkness.

quests.name: Balance Day and Night
quests.description: Discover an unnatural imbalance between day and night in the 'Twilight Grove.' Venture into the 'Realm of Equinox' and restore harmony by defeating the 'Eternal Dawnseeker' and 'Duskgazer Twilightbringer.'

quests.name: Whispers in the Twilight
quests.description: Listen to the whispers of ancient spirits residing in the 'Twilight Grove.' Decode their cryptic messages, uncover hidden knowledge, and gain their blessings.

quests.name: Lurkers in the Shadows
quests.description: Eliminate the 'Shadowstalkers' that lurk in the shadows of the 'Twilight Grove.' Protect the grove's inhabitants from these elusive, malevolent creatures.

quests.name: The Forgotten Twilight Ritual
quests.description: Discover an ancient 'Twilight Ritual' hidden in the grove's heart. Uncover the ritual's purpose, gather required artifacts, and perform it to unlock forgotten powers.
